name: Retriever of Lost Dreams
description:
"Your name is Rold. You live in a very special place in the Universe. This place is called Dreamland. Your job is to foster and guard the Dream Stars. For, from their stardust, the people's dreams are born.

For a long time, everything was running smoothly and you loved your job. But one day, an evil Force stole all the Dream Stars from Dreamland and hid them in a castle with many rooms, full of traps. Can you retrieve them all and return them, back home, to Dreamland?"

Retriever of Lost Dreams is a puzzle game with 55 one-screen rooms. You have to collect all the Dream Stars from each one of them. But can you? It will not be an easy task.

WARNING 1: This game requires a video card/driver that supports OpenGL 2.0 or greater!

WARNING 2: This game contains some hard to solve puzzles. ^_^
